akas from release info: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (original title)
San sheng san shi shi li tao hua China (Mandarin title) (complete title)

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

1.plot: Bai Qian must disguise herself as a man in order to become a disciple of Kunlun Mountain. Abducted from Kunlun Mountain, Bai Qian is told she must devote herself to Goddess Yao Guan.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

2.plot: Bai Qian convinces Ling Yu to sneak away with her and celebrate the birth of her father's grandchild. They encounter the Ghost Tribe on their way.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

3.plot: A trap is planned by the Ghost Tribe to try to overpower God Mo Yuan. Bai Qian finds an admirer in the enemy camp.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

4.plot: Bai Qian acquires a paramour, but must keep him hidden from her fellow disciples. Xuan Yu's jealousy turns into deception.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

5.plot: After betraying Bai Qian, Xuan Nu and Li Jing go to the Ghost realm to wed. But is Xuan Nu just a pawn in a large plan?

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

6.plot: The Ghost and Celestial Tribes go to war, enlisting allies, but paying heavy costs, when the Ghost Tribe uses an unbeatable weapon.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

7.plot: Mo Yuan makes a huge sacrifice, and the disciples of Kunlun Mountain must brace for their future.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

8.plot: The Second Prince of the Celestial Clan comes to ask for Bai Qian's hand in marriage, but she is nowhere to be found.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

9.plot: Ye Hua grows up, and it is proposed that he takes Sang Ji's place as the future groom of Bai Qian.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

10.plot: Heavenly Father agrees to the concession of his grandson Ye Hua in Sang Ji's place, but Su Jin, Ye Hua's concubine, has other ideas.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

11.plot: Feng Jiu is determined to find a way to repay her debt to Dong Hua. A fight on earth proves to be more than Ye Hua expected.

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

12.plot: The Fox Clan pieces the clues together and figures out where their Bai Qian has gone off to, but not how to find her.

13.title: Episode #1.13

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

13.plot: In the mortal realm, as a small black dragon, Ye Hua meets and is taken care of by Bai Qian, now known by her mortal name, Su Su.

14.title: Episode #1.14

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

14.plot: Li Jing goes to the mortal world to find Bai Qian, but as Su Su she decides to marry Ye Hua.

15.title: Episode #1.15

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

15.plot: Bai Feng Jiu disguised as a maid, tries to repay her debt to Dijun. Ye Hua reveals some of his magical powers to Su Su.

16.title: Episode #1.16

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

16.plot: Because of Su Su's angst at his long absences, Ye Hua starts to develop a plan that will allow him to stay in the mortal realm.

17.title: Episode #1.17

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

17.plot: Trying to ward off a war with the Mermaid Clan, Ye Hua brings Su Su to the Crystal Palace.

18.title: Episode #1.18

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

18.plot: Su Su learns surprising news and Liu Ying asks her to trust him one more time. The Mermaid King sends his son to the banquet in his stead.

19.title: Episode #1.19

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

19.plot: When Ye Hua is in distress, Su Su manages to break through his seal and stumble into the Celestial Realm, only to be taken capture by the Heavenly Lord.

20.title: Episode #1.20

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

20.plot: A compromise is met that will allow Su Su to stay in the Celestial Realm because of her condition, but not everyone is happy about it.

21.title: Episode #1.21

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

21.plot: Ye Hua's injuries are taking longer to heal than he expected. The Heavenly Lord tells Ye Hua that his wedding to Bai Qian must not be postponed any longer.

22.title: Episode #1.22

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

22.plot: The palace maids are all going to be investigated. Ye Hua is sent to the Far North to deal with the rebellion.

23.title: Episode #1.23

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

23.plot: Ye Hua returns from the Far North victorious, and just in time to see Su Jin set up Su Su.

24.title: Episode #1.24

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

24.plot: Multiple pregnancies are percolating, and complications arise. Ye Hua is honored in front of all of the high officials.

25.title: Episode #1.25

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

25.plot: Two babies are born on the same day, but their fates could not be more different.

26.title: Episode #1.26

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

26.plot: Su Su does something drastic after feeling abandoned by Ye Hua. In an attempt to save her, Ye Hua is immobilized.

27.title: Episode #1.27

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

27.plot: Su Su drinks amnesia potion and wakes up as Bai Qian. Ye Hua is not looking forward to his marriage to Su Jin and looks for a way out.

28.title: Episode #1.28

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

28.plot: Ye Hua tries to use the Soul-gathering Lamp to bring Su Su back, but 300 years later, she hasn't returned. Feng Jiu tries to borrow the lamp to wake Mo Yuan, which causes all sorts of problems.

29.title: Episode #1.29

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

29.plot: With the lamp returned to Qing Qiu, Ye Hua gives up on the idea of Su Su ever coming back, but A-Li doesn't.

30.title: Episode #1.30

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

30.plot: Bai Qian attends the Eastern Sea banquet and stirs up some trouble. Ye Hua makes a discovery.

31.title: Episode #1.31

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

31.plot: A-Li spends time with the woman he believes to be his mother, and Li Jing finally gets a chance at closure.

32.title: Episode #1.32

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

32.plot: Ye Hua gets to spend some quality time with his bride-to-be, and takes her to the mortal realm.

33.title: Episode #1.33

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

33.plot: Su Jin has a new plan to keep Ye Hua in the Celestial Palace and doesn't care what happens to anyone in her way.

34.title: Episode #1.34

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

34.plot: Shao Xing begs Bai Qian to help her son. Bai Qian seals her powers and goes to the Mortal Realm to help Yuan Zhen.

35.title: Episode #1.35

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

35.plot: Bai Qian tries to change fate by having the reincarnated Dijun pushed underwater to change his Trial of Love.

36.title: Episode #1.36

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

36.plot: Dijun falls in love with Xiao Jue, but she is told to break his heart. When Bai Qian learns that Mo Yuan and her son were taken Xuan Nu, she stops at nothing to get them back.

37.title: Episode #1.37

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

37.plot: Xuan Yu runs into an old rival when she is imprisoned, but they now have a common goal in mind.

38.title: Episode #1.38

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

38.plot: A death makes a strong enemy even stronger, almost guaranteeing he will escape and wreak havoc.

39.title: Episode #1.39

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

39.plot: Zhe Yan goes to visit Mo Yuan and thinks he may have a way to save the West Sea's eldest prince. Su Jin plots to win back Ye Hua's heart.

40.title: Episode #1.40

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

40.plot: Ye Hua has trouble dealing with constant rejection. Xuan Nu escapes and searches for Yan Zhi.

41.title: Episode #1.41

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

41.plot: A-Li still hasn't woken up after drinking too much fruit wine. Xuan Nu finds Bai Feng defenseless and begins to hatch a plan.

42.title: Episode #1.42

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

42.plot: Bai Feng gets manipulated into a scandal, and is forced to roll with it in order to give Dijun a trial on earth.

43.title: Episode #1.43

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

43.plot: Feng Jiu is forced to continue to pretend the scandal is real. Zhe Yan and Bai Qian begin preparations to wake up Mo Yuan.

44.title: Episode #1.44

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

44.plot: Bai Qian tries to understand her feelings. Feng Jiu laments her loss and is sent to keep Bai Qian company.

45.title: Episode #1.45

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

45.plot: Xuan Nu goes on a quest to get the divine fungal grass to save her son. Ye Hua also wants the divine fungal grass for his own ends.

46.title: Episode #1.46

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

46.plot: Bai Yi decides that Feng Jiu is ready to get married, but she is still devoted to Dijun. Ye Hua spends all his energy to create an elixir to help Bai Qian, but doesn't want her to know the sacrifices he made for her.

47.title: Episode #1.47

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

47.plot: Die Yong tells Bai Qian that she is not his type. Ye Hua is still trying to regain his strength and hide his sacrifice from Bai Qian.

48.title: Episode #1.48

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

48.plot: Li Jing and Yan Zhi bring the baby to Kunlun Mountain because they hope to find a way to wake him up. Bai Qian finally tells Ye Hua how she feels.

49.title: Episode #1.49

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

49.plot: Mo Yuan returns, and Ye Hua leaves. Will we ever see them in a room together?

50.title: Episode #1.50

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

50.plot: With Mo Yuan's return, the spell that houses Qi Cang begins to weaken.

51.title: Episode #1.51

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

51.plot: Bai Qian goes to the Mortal Realm to check on Ye Hua. Feng Jiu is still trying to get over Lord Dong Hua.

52.title: Episode #1.52

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

52.plot: Feng Jiu starts to come to terms with becoming the Queen of Qing Qiu but she takes a drastic action in the hopes of getting back together with Lord Dong Hua.

53.title: Episode #1.53

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

53.plot: Mo Yuan gets ready to meditate to regain his strength. Su Jin provokes Bai Qian and makes her question Ye Hua's love.

54.title: Episode #1.54

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

54.plot: When the Soul-catching Lamp is destroyed, something amazing happens.

55.title: Episode #1.55

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

55.plot: Su Jin stands trial for her numerous crimes. Li Jing summons Qi Cang to settle the score.

56.title: Episode #1.56

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

56.plot: It's an all-out battle as our heroes fight the forces of Qi Cang and the Ghost Tribe. A heroic sacrifice leads to a moral battle of what to do with the body.

57.title: Episode #1.57

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

57.plot: Bai Feng Jiu is crowned as the queen of Qing Qiu. Despite his death, Ye Hua's presence weighs heavily on Bai Qian's heart.

58.title: Episode #1.58

episode of.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom (TV Series 2017)

58.plot: In the finale, three years have passed since Ye Hua's death, but a strange occurence manifests around his coffin. Bai Qian goes to the Mortal Realm to visit a friend and hears a strange rumor.

imdb.title: Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossom
plot: Two deities Ye Hua and Bai Quian meet and fall in love. Their love story transcends time and has become a legend.
